casebody.data:
George POOLE, Appellant, v. Unknown FLANERY, Police Officer, Appellee. No. 06-3708. United States Court of Appeals, Eighth Circuit. Submitted: Oct. 5, 2007. Filed: Oct. 10, 2007. *200George Poole, St. Louis, MO, pro se. Peter J. Dunne, Rabbitt & Pitzer, St. Louis, MO, for Appellee.

Before MELLOY, HANSEN, and GRUENDER, Circuit Judges.

[UNPUBLISHED]

PER CURIAM.

George Poole appeals the district court’s1 adverse grant of summary judgment in his 42 U.S.C. § 1983 action. Upon careful review of the record, see Dulany v. Carnahan, 132 F.3d 1234, 1237 (8th Cir. 1997) (standard of review), we affirm for the reasons stated by the district court in its well-reasoned opinion, see 8th Cir. R. 47B.

. The Honorable Stephen N. Limbaugh, United States District Judge for the Eastern District of Missouri.
